channel.title: Help server errors!
channel.description:
Okay so im running trisidiaX and server will run fine but after a while seems as if combat dont want to work mostly mage when u try to attack a npc it wont show the hits and i get a message saying hit delayed. Please help me heres a pic
[img]http://i1323.photobucket.com/albums/u591/Toxic-x/errors.png[/img]

item.title: Help server errors!
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Something in the combat is throwing an ArrayIndexOutOfBounds Exception this is a perfect example of how inefficient PI is. PI’s magic combat is handled in huge memory depleting 3d arrays being looped through constantly, its not good.

As for your error, the exception is being printed out in the console showing you where the problem is, try and fix it, if you can’t post back here.

Read full topic
